text: Renan Augusto Lodi dos Santos is an Brazilian professional football player, He currently plays for Al Hilal club in the Saudi Professional League and Brazil national football team. == Club career == === Altético Madrid === On 2019, Lodi joined Atlético Madrid. On May 17, 2023, Lodi scored two times to beat Cetla. === Nottinggam Forest === On August 28, 2023, Lodi joined Nottingham Forest on loan. === Marseille === On 2023, Lodi joined Marseille. === Al Hilal === On January 2024, Lodi joined Al Hilal. On January 12, 2025, Lodi beat Al Orobah 5-0. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:Al Hilal SFC players Category:1998 births Category:Brazilian footballers
title: Renan Lodi
